participant_1.background:
I'm going to see my brother this weekend to take my mind off my wife.
my family came from greece in the 1950 s.
I live off the land and I'm content with my simple life.
My garden is my most prized possession.
i love to play league of legends.

participant_2.background:
I am average height, but my family is very tall.
I enjoyed a cup of chai tea after a long day of knitting.
i worry about money even though i m in high school.
I miss my mom's custom-made shoes.
i have a cat as a pet.

content.text: Hey there!  How are you doing?
I'm doing well! I just had a long day of knitting and I'm relaxing with a cup of chai tea.
That sounds lovely!  I'm going to see my brother this weekend.  He's my only family left since my parents passed away.
I'm sorry to hear that.  I'm glad you have a brother to spend time with.
Yeah, me too.  He's my best friend.  What do you like to do for fun?
I love to knit!  I also like to read and play video games.
I've never been much of a knitter, but I do enjoy reading and video games.  What kind of video games do you like to play?
I love to play League of Legends.  It's a really fun game.
I've heard of that game, but I've never played it.  Maybe I'll try it out sometime.
You should!  It's a lot of fun.  Do you have a cat?
No, I don't have any pets.  I wish I did, but I don't have the time to take care of one.
That's too bad.  Cats are great pets.  I love my cat.
I'm sure they are.  I'll have to get one someday.
Thanks for talking to me.  I'm going to go get ready for bed.  It was nice chatting with you.
No problem!  It was nice talking to you too.  Have a good night!
